preamble.directive_compliance: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 16B - G4.1 DEEP VALIDATION
preamble.vega_role: Independent verification of edge stability and illusion detection

mandates_executed: MANDATE IV: Signal Density & Crowding Check

edge_assessment_attestation.question: Is the observed edge Stable, Conditional, Fragile, or Illusory?

STABLE.attestation: VEGA confirms: NO signals demonstrate time-stable, regime-robust edge suitable for capital deployment.

CONDITIONAL.attestation: VEGA confirms: NO signals meet conditional edge criteria.

FRAGILE.attestation: VEGA confirms: 14 REGIME_EDGE signals show FRAGILE edge. High Sharpe (3.01) concentrated in recent time window only. Edge exists but is not time-stable. PLATINUM downgraded to GOLD. G5 eligibility REVOKED.

ILLUSORY.attestation: VEGA confirms: 12 MEAN_REVERSION signals demonstrate ILLUSORY edge. Aggregate Sharpe (0.64) masked negative performance in 2/3 test windows. Edge is a statistical mirage. SILVER downgraded to BRONZE.

mandate_i_stability.test_description: 3 non-overlapping time windows, each must maintain positive edge
mandate_i_stability.attestation: VEGA ATTESTS: All 26 signals FAILED stability testing. PLATINUM signals passed 1/3 windows (UNSTABLE). SILVER signals passed 0/3 windows (ILLUSORY). Time instability is the primary failure mode.

mandate_ii_regime.test_description: Verify regime-specific signals fail in wrong regimes
mandate_ii_regime.attestation: VEGA ATTESTS: All signals classified as REGIME_AGNOSTIC. No regime specificity confirmed despite REGIME_EDGE categorization. Regime-dependent alpha claims NOT VALIDATED.

mandate_iii_sensitivity.attestation: VEGA ATTESTS: All 26 signals show ROBUST parameter sensitivity. Edge is NOT curve-fit dependent. This is a positive finding, though insufficient alone for G5 eligibility.

mandate_iv_density.attestation: VEGA ATTESTS: PLATINUM signals are SPARSE (4 signals/year). High Sharpe driven by few trades raises statistical significance concerns. SILVER signals show OPTIMAL density but ILLUSORY edge.

rationale: G5 eligibility requires: (1) STABLE edge assessment AND (2) PLATINUM or GOLD classification
PLATINUM signals now classified as FRAGILE (not STABLE)
SILVER signals now classified as ILLUSORY (not STABLE)
g5_eligibility_ruling.attestation: VEGA RULES: G5 escalation BLOCKED for all tested signals. No signal demonstrates the time-stable, regime-robust edge required for paper trading authorization under ADR-012.

adr_012_economic_safety.attestation: G4.1 validation prevents deployment of unstable/illusory edges. Economic safety preserved.

adr_016_defcon.attestation: No circuit breaker triggers. Validation completed within normal parameters.

eqs_threshold.attestation: EQS threshold maintained. No signals rejected solely for EQS failure.

critical_findings.detail: All PLATINUM signals show positive edge in Window 3 only. Historical windows show weak/negative performance.
critical_findings.vega_assessment: Apparent alpha may be coincidental to recent market regime, not structural edge.

critical_findings.detail: REGIME_EDGE signals do not demonstrate regime-specific behavior under testing.
critical_findings.vega_assessment: Category classification may be incorrect. Signals behave as regime-agnostic.

critical_findings.detail: All SILVER signals failed all stability windows with negative Sharpe in 2/3 windows.
critical_findings.vega_assessment: Original SILVER classification was false positive. True edge is likely zero or negative.

critical_findings.detail: PLATINUM signals average 4 trades/year with 3.6% edge per signal.
critical_findings.vega_assessment: Statistical significance questionable. Requires longer observation period.

recommendations_to_ceo.recommendation: Maintain G5 block until time-stable edge demonstrated across multiple market regimes
Re-run alpha discovery with extended backtest windows (7-10 years) to capture multiple regime cycles
Implement minimum trade count threshold (>50 trades) for classification eligibility
Review REGIME_EDGE categorization logic - current signals do not exhibit expected regime specificity

vega_declaration.statement: VEGA, as Verification & Governance Authority, hereby attests that G4.1 Deep Validation has been executed in accordance with CEO Directive WAVE 16B. All 26 tested signals have been assessed. ZERO signals demonstrate the stable, time-robust edge required for G5 escalation. The G4.1 validation framework has successfully identified potential mirages before capital exposure.
